Articles.Content:
COMM-NET is a quality Tele-Comms providor for the planet Kerbin. COMM-NET Hosts a series of networks

to connect the people of Kerbin. Our engineers are dedicated to providing you the greatest in communication technology.

PRODUCTS

L-Comms Mk.

Light Communication satellite designed for low-orbit satellites (70-100km). This is decided to provide basic communication for you company!

Price : KS$12300

ModCast Mk1

Moderate Power Communication & Network satellite designed for able to service at a higher altitude (>150km). This satellite is a premium product for government use.

Price : KS$47000

UtilRec

High Powered satellite designed for high power data transfers helping to take stress of the communications network. This satellite is highly advanced and has technology allow the adjustment of its' orbit while it space.

This allows it to be deployed to different locations rapidly.

Price : KS$99999

NOTE : More craft coming soon!
